channel.title: Theathletic Job Postings
channel.description: Job postings for Theathletic from lever.co

item.title: WordPress Web Producer, Web Marketing
item.description:
Yelp is looking for an enthusiastic and experienced WordPress Web Producer with demonstrated ability to drive enterprise B2B marketing websites from concept to launch including ongoing maintenance and optimizations. The ideal candidate has strong project management skills, a keen eye for detail, enjoys working with cross-functional teams, and is passionate about creating great online user experiences. You will be responsible for the day-to-day management of multiple websites for various business marketing units, working with stakeholders from different teams to design, build and optimize website content.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.

item.title: Treasury Manager, Capital Markets
item.description:
*Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.*
The Team: What really sets us apart from most other treasury and finance roles and teams is that we really prioritize work life balance and want to ensure this is a “grind-free” environment. It’s also a silo-free environment so you will truly get exposure of areas outside of the norm to help make you a well-rounded professional and, well, mingle a little! While we like to have fun and a laugh, of course there are times we get busy, so let’s break down...
Position Overview: Reporting directly to the Corporate Treasurer, you and the Treasury function will grow with Yelp. The candidate will be a key contributor to the team in managing the reporting and covenant monitoring for existing and future funding facilities; analyzing and optimizing liquidity, capital structure planning, capital allocation and potential funding strategies; provide support for areas including cash management, cash flow forecasting, share repurchase strategies, FX hedging and funding, investment portfolio and potential capital markets/financing activities and Yelp’s corporate insurance program. Other strategic initiatives that the candidate will work on include defining high-level roadmaps and goals on optimizing and scaling out our current payment platform to support product initiatives while monitoring and communicating progress

item.title: Tax Analyst
item.description:
The Tax Analyst will report to the Tax Manager and will be part of the Finance and Workplace Organization of Yelp. This ambitious, fun and collaborative team takes care of all things corporate tax related for all of Yelp’s entities, including our international locations.
What really sets us apart from most other finance roles and teams is that we really prioritize work life balance and want to ensure this is a “grind-free” environment. Our team works closely with other teams across the Company including, but not limited to, the entire Finance organization, Legal, and Product. We do not work in a silo, so you will truly get exposure of areas outside of the norm to help make you a well-rounded professional and, well, mingle a little!This is a team that truly embodies the Yelp culture of having a great deal of mutual respect, collaboration and pitching in to help each other.
This is a full-time role based in the United States.

item.title: Staff Accountant
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
This position will be part of the Corporate Accounting Team within the Finance and Workplace organization of Yelp. This ambitious, fun and collaborative team takes care of the month-end accounting close for all of Yelp’s entities, including our international locations; then consolidating those results and communicating to stakeholders both internally and externally. What sets this team apart is the vast experience it has to offer, through exposure to key business partners as well as the wide array of financial topics covered. We connect all teams at Yelp to consistently deliver great execution and outstanding results.
This is a full-time role located in the United States.

item.title: Software Engineer – Core iOS (Remote)
item.description:
Have you ever wondered what happens under the hood when you hit “Build”? Do you often think of ways to improve code deployment systems? Or have an opinion on what makes a quality acceptance test? If so, you may be the next Core iOS engineer at Yelp.
Yelp’s Core iOS team is part of our Engineering Effectiveness group, responsible for creating and maintaining the infrastructure that facilitates iOS app development. The tools we build and platforms we maintain allow Yelp’s feature teams to focus their time and effort on shipping products that bring value to the company. We see ourselves as infrastructure engineers with a passion for iOS development and empathy for the community of iOS engineers that we support.
If you’re an iOS engineer who’s new to the infrastructure space but eager to learn, we’d love to hear what you could bring to the team.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular state within the US. We welcome applicants from throughout the US.

item.title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp has hundreds of millions of pieces of user-contributed content, millions of users and business listings, and hundreds of thousands of advertising customers–and all of these numbers are constantly growing. Yelp’s machine learning engineers turn raw data into valuable signals by building end-to-end ML systems, from feature ETL to deploying predictive models in production, as well as by building the ML platforms that these models rely on. These systems power applications like search ranking, ads targeting, push notifications, and photo understanding. Our data teams banter about Bandits, know their way down a Gradient, and aren’t too Naïve to kick back in our office.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new team members to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular region. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Software Engineer - iOS (Remote)
item.description:
Love working on iOS applications? No app is better suited for mobile than Yelp, and we're looking for Remote iOS engineers based out of Mexico to join our awesome team. Yelp connects you with that great local businesses right around the corner and lets you instantly share the experience to help the next person discover it, too.
Local businesses are turning to Yelp because we’re uniquely positioned to help them reach their customers during these challenging times. Our Engineering & Product teams have responded by quickly identifying their needs and building innovative products and features to support them. Our commitment to connecting people with great local businesses has never been stronger.
Our relatively small iOS community has a massive impact on the lives of millions. We help small business owners engage with their customers and build better connections. Yelp has always been on the cutting edge of iOS, launching our consumer iOS app over 10 years ago, more recently we launched the business owners app, and we continue pushing the envelope of what’s possible on iOS.
Our engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code their first week. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. We’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Mexico. We welcome applicants from throughout Mexico.

item.title: Software Engineer - iOS (Remote)
item.description:
No app is better suited for mobile than Yelp. When local content meets location-aware devices that go everywhere with us, Yelp connects with that great local businesses right around the corner and lets you instantly share the experience to help the next person discover it, too. It’s no wonder there are over 30 million users of our apps each month!
Our relatively small iOS community has had a massive impact on the lives of millions, reaching users from around the globe and helping small business owners engage with their customers and build better connections. Yelp has always been on the cutting edge of iOS. From launching our consumer app over 10 years ago, to more recently introducing our business owners app, we continue pushing the envelope of what’s possible on iOS.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack (Remote)
item.description:
Our full stack engineers bridge the gap between backend data and the frontend websites of Yelp. Our goal is to provide the best user experience to millions of users and we’re excited to dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
Full stack engineers rarely have a typical day: One day you might be writing HTML/CSS/JavaScript and another you might be discussing the best approach making our web apps work in our service oriented architecture.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact and is seen by millions of users? Our full stack engineers work across all areas of product development. You will build the features and applications that make Yelp the best place to find and support Local Business. Our goal is to provide an excellent experience for our users, and our full stack engineers dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
Full Stack engineers at Yelp have the flexibility to work on a wide subset of software development. You will have the opportunity to develop highly performant APIs on the backend as well as creating the visual components that our users interact with every day. If you enjoy getting a broad understanding of how to build applications at scale, full stack is the role for you.
Our engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code their first week. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. We’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Mexico. We welcome applicants from throughout Mexico.

item.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack (Remote)
item.description:
Our full stack engineers bridge the gap between backend data and the frontend websites of Yelp. Our goal is to provide the best user experience to millions of users and we’re excited to dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
Full stack engineers rarely have a typical day: One day you might be writing HTML/CSS/JavaScript and another you might be discussing the best approach making our web apps work in our service oriented architecture.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in Ireland.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact and is seen by millions of users? Our full stack engineers work across all areas of product development. You will build the features and applications that make Yelp the best place to find and support Local Business. Our goal is to provide an excellent experience for our users, and our full stack engineers dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
Full Stack engineers at Yelp have the flexibility to work on a wide subset of software development. You will have the opportunity to develop highly performant APIs on the backend as well as creating the visual components that our users interact with every day. If you enjoy getting a broad understanding of how to build applications at scale, full stack is the role for you.
Our engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Mexico. We welcome applicants from throughout Mexico.

item.title: Software Engineer - Frontend (Remote)
item.description:
Do you enjoy wrangling CSS and crafting beautiful JS? Want your work to be seen by millions of users? Our frontend engineers help build the experience that millions of consumers see every day. From making sure we’ve got fast and maintainable React applications to ensuring our sites are responsive, frontend engineers at Yelp do it all. We routinely take on hard challenges and care deeply about creating the best user experience. We develop using a modern tech stack that we evolve with the web industry, currently consisting of React.js, GraphQL, Webpack, Jest, and css-in-js.
Frontend engineers at Yelp collaborate closely with product managers and designers along with backend and full stack engineers.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code within their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Software Engineer - Frontend (Infrastructure) (Remote)
item.description:
Are you interested in leading the direction of the web platform for all of Yelp, and helping us adopt open source software like React and GraphQL to suit our needs? Our team supports hundreds of engineers who are providing the best user experience to millions of users!
You will design, build, help evolve and maintain the foundational frontend ecosystem. You will work on a team that strives to deliver seamless developer experiences while maintaining innovation, reliability and simplicity. Our users are other full stack engineers at Yelp, and our goal is to help them achieve faster iteration speeds and ship high quality code. You will collaborate closely with engineers to gather feedback and preferences to help create tooling, set best practices and define web architecture patterns that scale. The decisions you make will have a significant impact on every team at Yelp that deploys the website. What we do is key to developing and deploying features on the web, and we’d love for you to be part of it.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code within their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Software Engineer - Application Security (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for security engineers that can help keep us safe as we build out our desktop, mobile, business owner, and administrative websites. This opportunity allows you to have tremendous impact and broad scope protecting Yelp's enormous data, our employees, and our millions of users. Additionally, Yelp’s future growth in the transactions space has many security implications, both in traditional application security as well as in privacy controls and fraud and risk analysis.
As a Software Engineer in Security, you will be responsible for partnering with different engineering teams at Yelp to invent and build features, tools, and libraries to enable security by default. You’ll work to identify and fix vulnerabilities in the products we build, as well as work with external security researchers through our public bug bounty program.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. All new engineers deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping and building trust with our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Software Engineer - Application Backend (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact? Yelp is the richest source of local business data and user-generated content in the world. Our backend engineers use that data to power our websites and mobile apps. As a remote backend engineer, you’ll work closely with our mobile and web application developers to bring our 200M+ reviews to millions of users.
Backend engineers take on a diverse set of challenges across Yelp engineering. Do you want to make a positive impact on Yelpers looking for the best local businesses? Build products for business owners to get the most out of Yelp? Take on some of the most meaningful problems in distributed computing and API design? We'd love to share more about how our agile team creates an amazing experience for millions of users.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. All new engineers deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Software Engineer - Application Backend (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact? Yelp is the richest source of local business data and user-generated content in the world. Our backend engineers use that data to power our websites and mobile apps. As a remote backend engineer, you’ll work closely with our mobile and web application developers to bring our 200M+ reviews to millions of users.
Backend engineers take on a diverse set of challenges across Yelp engineering. Do you want to make a positive impact on Yelpers looking for the best local businesses? Build products for business owners to get the most out of Yelp? Take on some of the most meaningful problems in distributed computing and API design? We'd love to share more about how our agile team creates an amazing experience for millions of users.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. All new engineers deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Site Reliability Engineer (Remote)
item.description:
Do you want to build and manage scaleable, self-healing, globally-distributed systems? Our Site Reliability engineers keep Yelp fast, available, and growing, connecting users to great local businesses. No matter how many times we get searched, scraped, scanned, spammed, pinged, paged, or queried, we gotta keep our cool - and keep the site running smoothly.
We work in both the dev and systems worlds, implementing key parts of the core architecture and supporting devs as they try to do the same. We get to tackle interesting challenges that you can only find at the kind of scale that serves over 100 million users per month.
You'll work to empower product teams and developers: at Yelp, spinning up infrastructure should always be a git commit and a code review away: automation and self-service are at the core of what we do.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Databases
item.description:
Do you want to be a Database Reliability Engineer that builds and manages scaleable, self-healing, globally distributed systems? Our remote Database Reliability Engineers make sure users are always connected to great local businesses by keeping Yelp fast and available as we continue to scale. No matter how many times we get searched, scraped, scanned, spammed, pinged, paged, or queried, we gotta keep our cool — and keep the site and the apps running smoothly.
We work for both the Yelp end users and the Yelp developers, implementing key parts of the core architecture and supporting developers as they do the same. We get to take on interesting challenges that you can only find at the kind of scale that serves over 100 million users per month. item.title: Senior Treasury Manager, Capital Markets
item.description:
*Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.*
The Team: What really sets us apart from most other treasury and finance roles and teams is that we really prioritize work life balance and want to ensure this is a “grind-free” environment. It’s also a silo-free environment so you will truly get exposure of areas outside of the norm to help make you a well-rounded professional and, well, mingle a little! While we like to have fun and a laugh, of course there are times we get busy, so let’s break down...
Position Overview: Reporting directly to the Corporate Treasurer, you and the Treasury function will grow with Yelp. The candidate will be a key contributor to the team in managing the reporting and covenant monitoring for existing and future funding facilities; analyzing and optimizing liquidity, capital structure planning, capital allocation and potential funding strategies; provide support for areas including cash management, cash flow forecasting, share repurchase strategies, FX hedging and funding, investment portfolio and potential capital markets/financing activities and Yelp’s corporate insurance program. Other strategic initiatives that the candidate will work on include defining high-level roadmaps and goals on optimizing and scaling out our current payment platform to support product initiatives while monitoring and communicating progress

item.title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact and is seen by millions of users? You will build the features and applications that make Yelp the best place to find and support Local Businesses. Our goal is to provide an excellent experience for our users, and our full stack engineers dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
We are looking for a senior engineer who is passionate about building and scaling reliable software. You will be working on complex and innovative projects while collaborating with different organizations across Yelp ranging from engineering and product to marketing and sales. On the technical leadership front, you will be involved in the team’s planning spanning multiple quarters. You will also be responsible for coaching and mentoring engineers to maintain a high bar of code quality and maintainability.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. At the end of the day, we care most about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack (m/f/d) (Remote)
item.description:
Our full stack engineers bridge the gap between backend data and the frontend websites of Yelp. Our goal is to provide the best user experience to millions of users and we’re excited to dive into any area of the web stack to make it happen.
Full stack engineers rarely have a typical day: One day you might be writing HTML/CSS/JavaScript and another you might be discussing the best approach making our web apps work in our service oriented architecture.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems. We enable all new engineers to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor and team. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity has the option to be fully remote throughout Germany.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Backend Platform (Remote)
item.description:
Ever wish some information about a business was immediately at your fingertips? Maybe something about their health & safety, opening hours, services, or just a unique insight about that business? Interested in exploring that data, finding inventive ways to collect, curate, and make it easily accessible for others to use? How about doing that at scale? Does taking millions of these data points and helping hundreds of millions of consumers connect with millions of businesses sound exciting? Come and join us!
The Semantic Business Information (SBI) team at Yelp is looking for a data backend engineer to help build and support this platform. We implement the platforms that collect, curate, and serve critical and up-to-date information about all businesses on Yelp. We then provide any internal team this structured business information, so that they, in turn, can create richer user experiences. We are the backbone for the most important content that Yelp provides consumers and we would love to welcome a great engineer in our team!
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Backend (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp connects people with great local businesses, but who connects search queries to 100+ million reviews on millions of businesses in under 400 milliseconds? Who can select the perfect ad from millions of possibilities before the user can blink an eye? And after that user has found the perfect restaurant and is happily munching on their quinoa salad, who makes sure our logs are transported, transformed, and indexed so that we can create more awesome experiences for them next time? We do: the data backend engineers who make these systems work fast, efficiently, and at scale.
We’re looking for experienced engineers to join our team to build elegant, scalable systems that use NoSQL data stores, data warehouses, batch processing, and stream processing solutions to empower Yelp-wide use of Machine Learning to solve impactful business problems whether it’s providing a delightful user experience, data driven decision-making or ensuring the trustworthiness of Yelp’s content and protecting the platform from abuse. If you’re the person who leads their team to constantly improve existing systems and dives fearlessly into solving complex problems, then we’re looking for you!
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity, and encourages creative solutions to problems. New hires are empowered to deploy working code their first week -- and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager and mentor. At the end of the day, we are all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Search & Discovery (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp’s products are used by millions of people every day. At Yelp you’ll have an opportunity to make a real impact on a product you actually use. The team you’ll work with is small, scrappy, nimble, and fun. The culture at Yelp is a unique environment combining the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
More and more people today rely on Yelp’s trusted content to address their Home Services needs whether it is planning a move, fixing a leaky faucet, or investing in a kitchen remodel. We’re looking for a seasoned product manager to help us build a best-in-class home-owner experience, making Yelp a game-changer for both users and home service professionals. In this role, you will exercise your expertise in how to build for network effects in a large scale two sided marketplace, you will help bring a largely offline marketplace online - nothing short of remarkable.
If you are looking to own a key part of Yelp’s strategic future in a highly visible and impactful role, solve meaningful user & business owner needs within a marketplace, and work with highly cross functional groups of Product Managers, Engineers, Analysts & Data Scientists, Designers, and Product Marketers, then this role is for you.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
Vaccination against COVID-19 is not required for this role. We nonetheless encourage all employees to get vaccinated. Employees who are not vaccinated may not visit Yelp’s offices or participate in any in-person work activities, and are not eligible to transfer or be promoted to a role that requires vaccination.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Local Biz (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is used by millions of small and local businesses to manage their online presence. Local Businesses are turning to Yelp because we’re uniquely positioned to help them to grow their business and reach their potential customers. Our Product and Engineering teams have partnered with Local Businesses to identify their needs and build innovative products and features to support them. Our commitment to connecting people with great local businesses has never been stronger.
We are looking for a seasoned product manager to lead the charge for building new products and features for local business owners to manage online presence, advertise, and connect to potential customers. If you are looking to own a key part in our mission to help local businesses to grow, work in a billion dollar revenue company, and work with a cross functional group of Engineering, Design, Marketing teams, Biz Ops, Data Scientists, and other Product Managers then this role is for you.
The team you’ll work with is creative, nimble, and fun. The culture at Yelp is a unique environment combining the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment. Your work will have a huge impact on Yelp and the local business community.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular region. We welcome applicants from throughout Ontario.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Home and Local Services (Remote)
item.description:
Millions of users depend on Yelp to research, contact and vet local services professionals. If you’ve ever tried to hire a house cleaner or a plumber, chances are your experience took way longer than it should have. The market for hiring is enormous - $1 trillion in the US alone - but the process is inefficient and largely offline. Yelp is aiming to transform that.
Our team is leading the way to make it easier for our home and local services professionals to get hired. We help small businesses get discovered by high intent consumers, have a best in class experience to get hired by those consumers, and have access to new, high value paid products to accelerate their business growth. By focusing on these key areas, our pros are able to grow their businesses and make a living doing what they’re uniquely great at.
We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to reimagine the interaction between a business and consumer that is largely offline today, and extremely inefficient for all parties. If you are looking to own a key part of Yelp’s future growth at a billion dollar company, and work with a cross functional group of Engineers, Designers, Marketing teams, Biz Ops teams, Data Scientists, and other Product Managers then this role is for you.
The team you’ll work with is scrappy, nimble, and fun. It’s a rare opportunity to be on a team that combines the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment. Your work will have a huge impact on direct revenue & bottomline of Yelp.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in the US. We welcome applicants from throughout the US.
Vaccination against COVID-19 is not required for this role. We nonetheless encourage all employees to get vaccinated. Employees who are not vaccinated may not visit Yelp’s offices or participate in any in-person work activities, and are not eligible to transfer or be promoted to a role that requires vaccination.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Growth (Remote)
item.description:
Are you passionate about working on a product used and loved by millions of people every day? At Yelp, you’ll have an opportunity to make a real impact on a product at this scale while working in an innovative, nimble, and fun environment. The culture at Yelp is unique and combines the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of your focus area and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
As a Senior Product Manager on the Growth team, you’ll help identify and tackle a variety of different opportunities to drive overall user growth. We are responsible for expanding our user base by finding new and exciting ways for people to discover and use Yelp! Our team is composed of energetic and data-driven individuals that strive to make an impact through strong ideation and swift execution.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
Vaccination against COVID-19 is not required for this role. We nonetheless encourage all employees to get vaccinated. item.title: Senior Product Manager - Content Platform (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, you have the opportunity to make a real impact on a product used by millions of people every day. The team you’ll work with is innovative, nimble, and fun, with a knack for showcasing products that are reliable and scalable to our expanding market. The culture at Yelp is a unique environment combining the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative, no-BS, no-bureaucracy environment.
As a Product Manager for the Content Platform, you’ll be responsible for identifying, collecting, and making available rich content from our vast and vibrant community of business owners, partners, and millions of consumer contributors. You’ll help us determine what new ideas and trends Yelp needs to showcase, how to obtain that data at high coverage from new channels, how to organize it for high quality and availability, and how to curate and display it in the consumer experience.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

As a Product Manager for the Content Platform, you’ll be responsible for identifying, collecting, and making available rich content from our vast and vibrant community of business owners, partners, and millions of consumer contributors. You’ll help us determine what new ideas and trends Yelp needs to showcase, how to obtain that data at high coverage from new channels, how to organize it for high quality and availability, and how to curate and display it in the consumer experience.
This opportunity requires you to be located in Ireland.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Ads (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for a Senior Product Manager to build state-of-the-art ads features and algorithms. In this highly visible and impactful role, you’ll work on product areas that grow the advertising value of our marketplace for both businesses and users, developing and whiteboarding algorithms and ads features to release to market.
If you’re looking to own a key part in developing the ads system at a billion-dollar company and would enjoy working with a cross-functional group of product managers, applied scientists, machine learning engineers, backend engineers, and more, then this role is for you.
This remote opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Senior Product Designer (Remote)
item.description:
We’re in the process of transforming design at Yelp and searching for a Senior Product Designer ready to take the next step in their career. You’ll have ownership of the design of the product you’re working on, and will collaborate with product managers, engineers, writers, researchers, and other designers to make quick decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
Yelp is the best source of knowledge about local businesses. At Yelp, you'll have the opportunity to have a real impact on a product that hundreds of millions of consumers trust to discover and engage with businesses in their community!
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the Eastern Time zone of Canada.

item.title: Senior Manager, People Insights & Analytics
item.description:
*Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.*
Do you want to be part of a team focused on working strategically across the organization enabling and empowering insights to action? Yelp is looking for a Senior Manager, People Insights & Analytics to join the People team.
As a member of the People Strategy, Insights, & Ops team; we believe in leading with empathy and connecting the dots to deliver evidence-based decision making. We partner across the business to ensure alignment with our Yelp values, while establishing practices that deliver on business and people strategy. We champion a data-driven People team and an insight-led culture.
This is a full-time remote position based in the United States.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, it’s our mission to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s unique dataset contains billions of interactions between users and businesses around the globe, from a review of a coffee shop to requesting a repair quote with a photo of a leaky faucet. Data Scientists at Yelp work to make sense of these interactions to deliver impactful analyses and products to our users, business partners and the general public.
The Data Science & Analytics team performs analyses, builds models, and designs experiments that directly impact Yelp’s products and users. Our teams sit in Yelp’s central product management organization and work directly with cross-functional leaders to understand quantitatively how our products are performing and where the largest opportunities are. We are adept at tasks like modeling user preferences, inference from user and marketplace experiments, and generating insights about the health of local economies. With diverse backgrounds and expertise, we strive for learning and growth in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular state within the US. We welcome applicants from throughout the US.

item.title: Senior Brand Sales Director (Remote)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Enterprise team partners with National businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium native search advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part in client’s Local advertising mix and the Enterprise team is growing fast.
We are looking for an entrepreneurial, sales driven leader to generate revenue with our search re-targeting product, primarily through Agencies. You will develop and work a territory and drive new business from prospecting to close. As Yelp’s Senior Brand Sales Director, you will drive revenue and growth of Yelp’s search re-targeting products through our audience platform.
To succeed in this role, you will need to have relevant digital or advertising sales experience and a demonstrated track record of exceeding goals. The Senior Brand Sales Director role is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Enterprise Sales team!

item.title: Senior Account Executive (Remote)
item.description:
Passionate about helping restaurants succeed? Our suite of products reaches and engages diners with an unforgettable experience on the largest restaurant discovery platform on the planet. Our mission is to provide the best experience for diners when they engage with restaurants, and to be the number one partner for restaurants as they navigate their daily challenges.
As an Account Executive, you will get the opportunity to work with some of the leading restaurant sales professionals in the country. You'll be surrounded by a team who has built careers within Yelp, that constantly raise the bar, and are always striving to be the standard for sales within the restaurant industry. At Yelp Restaurants, you will get the opportunity to work in a small team that is in charge of shaping the sales strategy for restaurants within Yelp.
We are committed to your success and development. You will be mentored by one of our top performers as you learn the ropes and you’ll be part of the Yelp Sales Development Program, which is a two-year track for your professional growth. This transparent program outlines what you need to be doing every day, month, and quarter to reach the next level. Increased compensation, title and responsibilities will keep your career moving in the right direction. If you’re looking for a career (not a job), a company that's invested in your personal development, a solid compensation package, great training, and have a passion for the restaurant industry, we know just the place.
This is a full-time remote position

item.title: Sales Manager (Remote)
item.description: Ready to take your career in sales to the next level? Yelp is looking for Sales Managers of all levels to join as key members of Yelp’s Local Sales team. With over 138 million unique monthly visitors to the site, a rapidly expanding user community, and a built-in forum for consumer interactions, Yelp is a fantastic place for advertisers to reach an actively engaged audience. You will be responsible for managing a team of 10-12 inside sales executives while driving monthly revenue targets through new business acquisition. Our fast-paced sales team has a positive attitude and drive to win. This is a great opportunity to grow your career, make money, and have fun doing it.

item.title: Sales and Marketing Counsel (Remote)
item.description:
Candidates must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp is looking for a clever attorney to join its small but nimble legal team in supporting our popular and growing consumer internet company in its efforts to connect millions of people with great local businesses. Yelp is a profitable, publicly-traded company with thousands of employees located primarily in the U.S., Canada, U.K. and Germany.
This role focuses on supporting Yelp’s marketing, product, and sales teams in achieving success with their advertising and promotional initiatives. You’ll gain a deep understanding of Yelp’s ad products and sales processes while helping to identify and mitigate legal and business risks associated with Yelp’s revenue operations.
This is a full-time position which can be based anywhere in the U.S. Yelp’s legal team currently has lawyers in the states of California, Illinois, Texas, and Washington.

item.title: Revenue Operations Analyst
item.description:
As a Revenue Operations Analyst, you would be responsible for partnering and supporting Yelp’s Multi-Location sales groups to help connect data with sales processes, distribution of accounts, and revenue/compensation initiatives. Focus includes custom reporting and analyses, data stewardship/automation, and project management on all things revenue operations. A successful Revenue Operations Analyst will be able to establish autonomy, provide effective technical solutions, and broaden visibility and teamwork with business partners. Our team is customer oriented, focused on helping sales attain and surpass their goals.
This is a full-time remote role based in the United States.

item.title: Restaurant Support Specialist - Customer Success (Remote)
item.description:
**Please note the following: In this role, you will be expected to work an 8 hour shift between the operational hours of 6:00am to 8:00pm Pacific Time. The working days will be Monday through Friday and two weekend days a month.
Love to dine out? Passionate about the industry and helping restaurants succeed? Yelp Reservations and Yelp Waitlist are powerful tools for amazing dining experiences. Our reservation and waitlist platform reaches and engages diners with an unforgettable experience on the largest restaurant discovery platform on the planet. Whether you’re planning two weeks or 20 minutes in advance, our mission is to empower diners to browse and book a table at a restaurant they will love.
Fast-paced and growth minded: Yelp Restaurants is a true startup, so get ready to make an impact! You’ll help lots of businesses, learn very quickly, and contribute directly to our strategy. Restaurant Support Managers are committed to providing exceptional customer service with the goal of retaining and growing our client base - but, above all else, provide stellar customer service. You’ll efficiently manage and respond to a variety of questions and issues that may require troubleshooting, researching or collaborating with the team while you listen and reassure our clients.

item.title: Regional Director - Brand Sales (Remote, West Region)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Want to work with big brands? Love coaching and developing individuals? Ready to kick things up a notch? Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Enterprise team partners with National brands to provide industry leading advertising solutions. Our Yelp Audience Platform product delivers strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part of a client’s advertising mix and the Enterprise team is growing fast.
We are looking for an experienced Regional Director, Brand Sales to lead a team of Senior Brand Sales Directors in all areas from prospecting, pitching and closing new business, to driving new revenue through our Yelp Audience Platform product. The ideal candidate has a proven record of developing and coaching a team, while navigating through an evolving organization. The Regional Director, Brand Sales role is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Enterprise Sales team

item.title: Programmatic Campaign Manager
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Millions of consumers use Yelp to connect with great local businesses, whether that’s a mom-and-pop shop or an international brand like Starbucks. Yelp continues to see strong growth from large brands. As a result we are seeking a Campaign Manager to implement, manage and optimize programmatic ad campaigns across a portfolio of Enterprise Yelp customers.
The role requires knowledge of digital ad strategy, media planning and programmatic media buying across SSPs, DSPs, Ad Exchanges, Ad Networks and Trading Desks. Success in the Campaign Manager role will require daily communication and collaboration with Product, Sales, and Customer Success teams.

item.title: Product Leader - Home & Local Services
item.description:
Millions of users depend on Yelp to research, contact and vet local services professionals. If you’ve ever tried to hire a house cleaner or a plumber, chances are your experience took way longer than it should have. The market for hiring is enormous - $1 trillion in the US alone - but the process is inefficient and largely offline. Yelp is aiming to transform that.
Our team is leading the way to make it easier for our home and local services professionals to get hired. We help small businesses get discovered by high intent consumers, have a best in class experience to get hired by those consumers, and have access to new, high value paid products to accelerate their business growth. By focusing on these key areas, our pros are able to grow their businesses and make a living doing what they’re uniquely great at.
We are looking for a Group Product Manager to lead a team of 4 talented PMs. If you are looking to own a key part of Yelp’s future growth at a billion dollar company, and work with a cross functional group of Engineers, Designers, Marketing teams, Biz Ops teams, Data Scientists, and other Product Managers then this role is for you.
The team you’ll work with is innovative, nimble, and fun. It’s a rare opportunity to be on a team that combines the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment. Your work will have a huge impact on direct revenue & bottomline of Yelp.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular region. We welcome applicants from throughout North America.

item.title: Product Designer (Remote)
item.description:
We’re in the process of transforming design at Yelp and searching for a remote Product Designer ready to take the next step in their career. You’ll have ownership of the design of the product you’re working on, and will collaborate with product managers, engineers, writers, researchers, and other designers to make quick decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
Yelp is the best source of knowledge about local businesses. At Yelp, you'll have the opportunity to have a real impact on a product that hundreds of millions of consumers trust to discover and engage with businesses in their community!
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Product Design Manager (Remote)
item.description:
We’re looking for an experienced Product Design Manager to help define and drive the future of Yelp Design.
Yelp is the best source of knowledge about local businesses. At Yelp, you'll have the opportunity to have a real impact on a product that hundreds of millions of consumers trust to discover and engage with businesses in their community!
In this role you will manage a small team of Product Designers while collaborating with product managers, engineers, writers, researchers, and other designers to make quick decisions in a highly collaborative environment. You will also ensure consistent and high-quality creative work, while enabling the growth and development of your team.
Product Design is globally distributed with teams across the United States, Canada, United Kingdom and Germany, fully remote complemented by hub offices. This team is centered around our Toronto hub.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the Eastern Time zone of Canada.

item.title: Principal Platform Software Engineer - Data Streams (Remote)
item.description:
Are you the person who leads their team in replacing an aging system, or dives into the guts of a running system to fix that bug everyone is happy to gloss over? Do you love making complex systems easy to use, resilient, and scalable? Keep reading.
Yelp connects people with great local businesses, but who connects search queries to 180M+ reviews on millions of businesses in under 400 milliseconds? Who selects the perfect ad from millions of options in the blink of an eye? And after that user has found the perfect restaurant and is happily munching on their quinoa salad, who makes sure our logs are transported, transformed, and indexed so we can do even better next time? We do! The platform engineers at Yelp make these systems work fast, efficiently, and at scale.
We’re looking for experienced engineers to join our team and build elegant, scalable platforms that bring the potential of data streams to Yelp’s features teams. From transporting events reliably between services and datastores with Kafka to processing massive streams of data in real-time with Flink and Beam, our team offers simple abstractions to power a whole host of personalized experiences for Yelp’s users and drive optimizations for Yelp’s advertising businesses.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems. New hires are expected to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager and mentor. At the end of the day, we’re all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

And after that user has found the perfect restaurant and is happily munching on their quinoa salad, who makes sure our logs are transported, transformed, and indexed so we can do even better next time? We do! The platform engineers at Yelp make these systems work fast, efficiently, and at scale.
We’re looking for experienced engineers to join our team and build elegant, scalable platforms that bring the potential of data streams to Yelp’s features teams. From transporting events reliably between services and datastores with Kafka to processing massive streams of data in real-time with Flink and Beam, our team offers simple abstractions to power a whole host of personalized experiences for Yelp’s users and drive optimizations for Yelp’s advertising businesses.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems. New hires are expected to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager and mentor. At the end of the day, we’re all about helping our users, growing as engineers, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Principal Engineer - Databases (Remote)
item.description:
Do you want to be a Principal Database Reliability Engineer that builds and manages scaleable, self-healing, globally distributed systems? Our remote Database Reliability Engineers make sure users are always connected to great local businesses by keeping Yelp fast and available as we continue to scale. No matter how many times we get searched, scraped, scanned, spammed, pinged, paged, or queried, we gotta keep our cool — and keep the site and the apps running smoothly.
We work for both the Yelp end users and the Yelp developers, implementing key parts of the core architecture and supporting developers as they do the same. We get to take on interesting challenges that you can only find at the kind of scale that serves over 100 million users per month. Spinning up infrastructure should always be a git commit and a code review away: automation and self-service are at the core of what we do.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: People Operations Coordinator
item.description:
Yelp is looking for a People Operations Coordinator to join our People Services team. We are focused on providing seamless and client-focused transactional support to our employees and internal stakeholders in offices globally. Playing a key tactical role throughout the employee lifecycle from hiring and onboarding to developing and off-boarding, we deliver on operational excellence while maintaining high levels of confidentiality.
As the People Operations Coordinator, you will interact regularly with other People functions including Recruiting, People Business Partners, Total Rewards, Talent Development, Payroll and Legal. This position is a great opportunity to execute People Team processes and services in a global organization.
This is a full time remote role based in Canada.

item.title: Partner Account Executive (Remote, West)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp is looking for a sales professional with a proven track record of success in a fast-paced, high growth company to join Yelp’s newest division, Agency & Partner Sales. This is a great opportunity to be part of a team at the ground floor within the Yelp organization.
The primary responsibility of the Partner Account Executive is to acquire new business for Yelp by developing relationships with SMB digital marketing agencies. These agencies partner with Yelp to resell and buy Yelp’s Local products.
The ideal candidate for this position will have the ability to quickly understand the business and demonstrate the value of Yelp’s product offering and partnership program. This position requires a highly motivated and energetic individual who possesses the ability to develop strategic relationships and generate new business. The ideal candidate takes a consultative approach to sales - understanding agency models and uncovering the needs and decision criteria of your prospects. Above all, you will be responsible for hitting your revenue targets.

item.title: Oracle Application Engineer (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for an Oracle Cloud ERP Engineer to join the Finance Engineering team. We are part of Yelp’s Commerce organization. Together, we work on Oracle's EBS, which is moving rapidly to Oracle's Enterprise Resource Planning cloud. This platform supports the infrastructure tools, automation, integrations, and reports utilized by folks in the Finance team.
You will support the Oracle Cloud ERP environment - by leading projects to optimize Yelp’s Oracle footprint, supporting product launches, and scaling the Finance environment to meet Yelp’s business needs.
Day to day responsibilities include managing and executing project requirements, analysis, design, scheduling, development, and delivery of the Oracle Financials development components. You will be actively working on Oracle Financials implementations on cloud.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Online Community Ambassador - Indianapolis
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
If community is more than just a word to you... If you love the Yelp app, and more importantly, use it all the time… If you are the kind of person that prefers raving about your favorite local businesses… If you relish connecting with other Yelpers online… If you love Indianapolis and want to shout all the reasons why from the rooftops... Well, we just might have the perfect job for you.
As the Indianapolis/Denver Online Community Ambassador, you’ll be a part-time Yelp employee, working out of your home or anywhere with secure Wi-Fi. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, will be connecting with local Yelpers and, in turn, helping them connect with each other online, as well as assisting community members with how to get the most out of the Yelp website and mobile app.

item.title: Midmarket Account Executive (West Region) - Remote
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
*Please note that while this role will operate remotely, it is required that the candidate resides in the West Region and within 50 miles of a major airport. States included in Yelp's defined West Region include: California (excluding the Bay Area), Washington, Oregon, Idaho, Montana, Wyoming, Nevada, Utah, Arizona, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas.*
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Midmarket team partners with established and growing multi-location businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp has become an essential part in clients’ local advertising mix and the Midmarket team is growing fast.
The Midmarket Account Executive works with multi-location regional clients selling Yelp's diverse advertising products. You will develop an understanding of your clients’ needs, educate them on Yelp's platform and develop Yelp Ad campaigns that will help them better connect with their customers and drive in-store sales. We are looking for someone with relevant digital, media, or advertising sales experience and a demonstrated track record of exceeding goals. This role is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Multi-Location Sales team.
#LI-REMOTE

item.title: Marketing Automation Associate, B2B (Remote)
item.description:
Candidates must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp is looking for a Marketing Operations Associate to help us deliver operational excellence within our growing B2B Marketing team. The ideal candidate has a solid business sense balanced with strong system technical aptitude. They will play a key role in the success of our marketing programs, processes and should be very comfortable in leveraging marketing automation technologies. We’re looking for someone highly detail oriented, relentlessly process driven and a stellar communicator both written and verbal.
If you're jumping out of your chair after reading this, send us your resume and a cover letter telling us why we'd be crazy not to hire you.
This is a full time role based in the United States.

item.title: Manager, Corporate Strategy (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, it’s our mission to connect people with great local businesses. The Yelp Strategy team supports this mission by working with Yelp executives to articulate our long term direction and top priorities.
The Strategy team works with leaders to codify the growth opportunities and threats in our business. The team synthesizes external and internal insights, pulling it all together into a continually refreshed view of our customer & competitive landscape. The Strategy team also partners with operating leaders across the company on complex landscape & customer questions, and helps leaders align their priorities with Yelp’s strategic direction.
As a Team Lead on the Strategy team, you’ll lead a team of analysts, acting as a player coach. You should enjoy running your own analysis as much as mentoring and managing analysts in your team. You’ll be reporting to the SVP, Strategy, and working closely with leaders across Yelp’s functions.
We’re looking for someone with a knack for synthesis - the ability to find and integrate a broad range of qualitative and quantitative sources into pithy, impactful insights. You are a highly driven and proactive person with a record of high impact and achievement, eager to apply your analytical and creative talents to new challenges. You are a team player who is an excellent communicator, quick learner, and as excited about Yelp as we are.
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
This is a full time role based in the United States.

item.title: Manager, Consumer Lifecycle Marketing
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Our team is growing at a rapid pace and we are looking for a Lifecycle Manager (CRM) to join our Consumer Marketing team. This team member will be responsible for the channel execution of marketing programs, including email and push notifications, to drive consumer engagement on Yelp. And the best part is, you get to see the direct impact your campaigns have on our bottom line.
The ideal candidate brings a data-driven approach to decision-making, a keen creative eye, and has experience in email and push marketing. A successful candidate has experience supporting world-class marketing programs and is comfortable leveraging marketing automation technologies. They are relentlessly process driven, a stellar communicator, and detail-oriented.
This is a full time remote role located in the United States.

item.title: Local Business Account Manager (Remote)
item.description:
Please note that while this role will operate remotely, it is required that the candidate resides in the United States (excluding the Bay Area).
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Account Management Team works with established and growing local businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp is an essential part of many local businesses advertising strategy and Local Business Account Managers are the experts on optimizing these advertising campaigns.
The Local Business Account Managers work with existing advertisers to increase their exposure on Yelp by upgrading and optimizing their advertising campaign. They will develop an understanding of client needs, educate them on Yelp's platform and develop Yelp Ad campaigns that will help them better connect with their customers and drive in-store sales. This role is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Account Management Team. If you’re looking for a career, a company that's invested in your personal development, a solid compensation package, great training, and have a passion for local business owners, we know just the place.
This is a full-time remote position
