item.title: Lead Product Manager - Platform (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, you have the opportunity to make a real impact on a product used by millions of people every day. The team you'll work with is dynamic, engaging, and fun, with a knack for making products that are reliable and scalable to our expanding market. The culture at Yelp is a unique environment combining the best parts of being at a startup with the stability and resources of a successful public company. You’ll have full ownership of the product you’re working on and will be able to make fast decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
Yelp is looking for an experienced product manager to build critical foundational platforms to power a $1B company, such as creating a Marketing Platform from the ground up, or a Product Foundations system that accelerates development and innovation of teams across the company. This is a highly cross-functional role where you’ll keep close communication across Yelp’s executive team, collaborate with other Product Managers, Engineers, Product Marketing, Marketing Operations partners and more to ultimately help create a vision for a large group of engineers.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular region. We welcome applicants from throughout Ontario and Quebec.

item.title: Lead Product Designer (Remote)
item.description:
We’re in the process of transforming design at Yelp and searching for a Lead Product Designer ready to take the next step in their career. You’ll have ownership of the design of the product you’re working on, and will collaborate with product managers, engineers, writers, researchers, and other designers to make quick decisions in a highly collaborative environment.
Yelp is the best source of knowledge about local businesses. At Yelp, you'll have the opportunity to have a real impact on a product that hundreds of millions of consumers trust to discover and engage with businesses in their community!
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Lead Product Designer - Content (Remote)
item.description:
We’re looking for a talented, collaborative Product Design Lead to join Yelp’s growing Content team. In this role, you will be the champion for the Yelp community. You will be empowered to rethink how contributors add content to Yelp as well as how they interact with other people on the platform. You will partner closely with other Product Designers, User Researchers, Product Managers, Engineers and other cross-functional partners while helping to push for great content on the Yelp platform.
As a Lead Product Designer on Yelp’s Content team, you will champion a team of talented designers in rethinking how people add content to Yelp. Our team works on mobile and web flows for both consumers and business owners, rethinking how Yelp users share their content. We own some of Yelp’s core flows including the review flow, photo upload flow, user profile, and much more. his is a highly visible role with a large impact.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Lead Product Designer - Content (Remote)

You will partner closely with other Product Designers, User Researchers, Product Managers, Engineers and other cross-functional partners while helping to push for great content on the Yelp platform.

We own some of Yelp’s core flows including the review flow, photo upload flow, user profile, and much more. his is a highly visible role with a large impact.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the Eastern Time zone of Canada.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Junior Software Engineer - Application Backend (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact? Using the richest source of local business data and user-generated content in the world, Yelp’s application backend engineers work closely with mobile and web developers to generate and power our websites and mobile apps, bringing Yelp’s 244M+ reviews to millions of users all around the world.
Application backend engineers take on a diverse set of challenges across the engineering org, from building products for business owners to get the most out of Yelp, to taking on some of the most meaningful problems in distributed computing and API design.
This opportunity requires you to be located in Ireland.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Junior Sales Manager (Remote)
item.description: Ready to take your career in sales to the next level? Yelp is looking for Junior Sales Managers to join as key members of Yelp’s Local Sales team. With over 138 million unique monthly visitors to the site, a rapidly expanding user community, and a built-in forum for consumer interactions, Yelp is a fantastic place for advertisers to reach an actively engaged audience. You will be responsible for managing a team of 10-12 inside sales executives while driving monthly revenue targets through new business acquisition. Our fast-paced sales team has a positive attitude and drive to win. This is a great opportunity to grow your career, make money, and have fun doing it.

item.title: Junior Data Backend Engineer - Product Monetization Platform (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, we’re on a mission to grow the local economy by connecting users with great local businesses. The Product Monetization Platform team brings new product ideas to market. Via our APIs, developers can confidently know that the connections they create translate into real revenue for Yelp.
On our team, you’ll be responsible for helping produce critical financial data streams that serve as a source of truth for the rest of the company. By designing and implementing our data infrastructure, you’ll ensure that millions of complex interactions are processed efficiently every day and meet the high bar of our systems’ availability and performance. You’ll design data streams and APIs that empower engineers and decision-makers throughout the organization.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Junior Application Backend Engineer - CPC Mobile (Remote)
item.description:
Want to join a team where your work makes a significant impact? Using the richest source of local business data and user-generated content in the world, Yelp's engineers work towards bringing Yelp’s 244M+ reviews to millions of users across the globe.
The CPC Mobile team is responsible for contributing to Yelp’s Server-Driven UI framework and plays a critical role in ensuring that the flows that business owners use to purchase Yelp’s ads and understand our products are built to provide the utmost impact. You’ll have a unique position within the org, supporting multiple teams and working with stakeholders across Yelp to find the best way to deliver mobile features that have a direct impact on Yelp’s revenue.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: IT Supervisor - Chicago
item.description:
Candidates must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Do you enjoy working in an environment surrounded by dynamic and innovative teams? We’re looking for an IT Supervisor to lead Yelp’s IT Operations team in our Chicago office.
As an IT Supervisor you’ll manage a local team of technicians to meet company goals in delivering five star customer service. You’ll be guiding your team through task management and prioritization, projects, best practices and Yelp processes. We’re looking for inspiring leaders who encourage teams to achieve department goals through great customer interactions.
Yelp’s IT Operations team provides outstanding support for our Yelpers (internal employees) and are the experts when it comes to in-office technology. The IT Operations team focuses on technical support and technology logistics including all onboarding, offboarding, hardware refresh and inventory management. You’ll be managing a small IT fulfillment operation in Chicago that has a focus on inventory management and delivery of goods as well as remote customer support.
Please note that this opportunity is exclusively available physically in office and requires regular attendance in our work space (Monday-Friday). This role can not be completed 100% remotely.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: IT Site Support Technician (Phoenix)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Do you have a passion for tech and love helping others? Would you like to work in an environment surrounded by energetic, dynamic teams working on the latest technology with an inspiring and positive attitude? We’re looking for an IT Site Support Technician to join Yelp’s IT Operations team in our Phoenix office.
Our Yelp IT Operations team provides world class support for our employees in our Yelp offices and those working remote. As an IT Site Support Technician, you’ll deliver 5-star service and support both in-office and for our remote employees throughout the U.S. You’ll also be the escalation point for Tier 2 issues and be responsible for supporting Mac, Chrome OS and Windows desktops and laptops, mobile devices, phones, printers, video conferencing, training and general assistance. We’re primarily an Apple and Chrome OS environment, so we’re looking for a teammate who can comfortably live and breathe in the Mac and Chrome world.
Please note that this opportunity is exclusively available physically in the office and requires regular attendance in our office space (Monday-Friday). This role can not be completed remotely.
We would love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Inside Sales Representative (Remote - Western Region)
item.description:
*Please note that while this role will operate remotely, it is required that the candidate resides in the Western Region of the United States. At this time we are not considering candidates in the Bay Area.*
Yelp was created to connect people with great local businesses. As an Inside Sales Representative (ISR), you'll be working directly with these local businesses to help them achieve their goals through Yelp’s various advertising programs. You'll work with small business owners via phone to determine their needs and aspirations and customize every sale to help make those happen. We succeed when we help our clients grow their businesses.
Because people are at the center of everything we do, one of your main priorities is to educate business owners about the value of Yelp's advertising platform. In this role, you will be directly responsible for selling advertising space on Yelp to local businesses across the US and Canada. Success in this role is measured by hitting and exceeding monthly sales goals, consistently staying ahead of daily metrics, and handling rejection in stride. You’ll experience all of this in a supportive virtual team environment with the added flexibility of a remote workspace.
Please visit www.yelp.com/careers and apply to the appropriate posting that matches your location.

item.title: Head of Brand Sales (Remote)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Brand team partners and sells to Fortune 1000 businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers across the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part of a Marketer’s advertising mix and the Brand team has been on a rocketship since launching in 2020.
We are looking for an entrepreneurial, sales-driven leader to generate revenue within a vast ocean of Brands. The primary responsibility of the Head of Brand Sales is to lead a team of Directors and sellers who are tasked with driving millions in revenue from the world’s largest Brand advertisers. You will build deep business relationships with Yelp’s most valuable customers while growing topline revenue (and new logos) for Yelp’s brand division. To succeed in this role, you will need to have held large and strategic leadership roles at established digital media or Ad Tech firms. Additionally you have demonstrated a consistent and strong track record of exceeding goals.

item.title: Head of Brand Sales (Remote, East Region)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Brand team partners and sells to Fortune 1000 businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers across the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part of a Marketer’s advertising mix and the Brand team has been on a rocketship since launching in 2020.
We are looking for an entrepreneurial, sales-driven leader to generate revenue within a vast ocean of Brands. The primary responsibility of the Head of Brand Sales is to lead a team of Directors and sellers who are tasked with driving millions in revenue from the world’s largest Brand advertisers. You will build deep business relationships with Yelp’s most valuable customers while growing topline revenue (and new logos) for Yelp’s brand division. To succeed in this role, you will need to have held large and strategic leadership roles at established digital media or Ad Tech firms. Additionally you have demonstrated a consistent and strong track record of exceeding goals.

item.title: Full Stack Engineer - Compliance Engineering (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for an authentic, tenacious, unboring Full Stack engineer—who plays well with others and protects the source!—to join our Compliance Engineering team. You’ll dive headfirst into Yelp’s stack, developing on both our mobile and web applications and growing your career across a wide subset of software development.
As a Full Stack engineer on the Compliance Engineering team, you’ll have a tremendous impact protecting Yelp’s enormous data footprint, our employees, and our millions of users. You’ll be working closely with the rest of the organization to identify and implement data compliance components across Yelp’s applications, developing solutions that meet all applicable data regulations and privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.) at Yelp.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Enterprise Client Success Specialist, Digital Media (West Region)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp is seeking an operational and results driven Customer Success Specialist to work closely with our Multi-Location Sales teams to drive results for national advertising campaigns.
As a leader in connecting people with great local businesses, Yelp works with large national clients in every category and industry. Our Customer Success team partners with Yelp Sales to provide industry leading digital and programmatic advertising solutions to corporate accounts and agencies, helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel.
As a Customer Success Specialist, you will play an important role using data and attribution methodologies to drive optimizations for national advertising campaigns. Your knowledge of search and programmatic media buys, combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities will help Yelp’s key clients attract new customers and achieve even greater returns on their investments in Yelp’s advertising solutions. To succeed in this role, you will need to have relevant digital advertising client experience and a demonstrated track record of analyzing and optimizing advertising campaigns against co-authored client KPIs. The Customer Success team is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Multi-Location teams!
** This is a remote position #LI-REMOTE**

item.title: Enterprise Account Executive, Growth (West/Midwest Region) - Remote
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
*Please note that while this role will operate remotely, it is required that the candidate resides in the MidWest OR West Region and within 50 miles of a major airport. States included in Yelp's defined MidWest OR West Region include: North Dakota, South Dakota, Nebraska, Kansas, Minnesota, Iowa, Illinois, Missouri, Indiana, Ohio, Michigan and Wisconsin. California (EXCLUDING THE BAY AREA), Washington, Oregon, Idaho, Montana, Wyoming, Nevada, Utah, Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas.*
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Enterprise team partners with National and Mid-Market businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium native search advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part in clients’ local advertising mix and the Enterprise team is growing fast!
The Enterprise Client Partner works with Yelp’s existing clients to grow their spend on Yelp. You will have a defined book of business and will be tasked with driving new revenue with those accounts. You will understand your clients’ business goals, marketing strategies, timelines and budgets to ensure Yelp is a prominent part of their marketing mix. To succeed in this role, you will secure investment in Yelp to drive sales at the local level for your clients. This is a high-energy, client-facing sales role requiring industry expertise and proven sales prowess. The Enterprise Client Partner role is key to Yelp’s success and significant growth is expected from our existing National Account base as we scale the Enterprise team!
#LI-REMOTE

Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
*Please note that while this role will operate remotely, it is required that the candidate resides in the MidWest OR West Region and within 50 miles of a major airport. States included in Yelp's defined MidWest OR West Region include: North Dakota, South Dakota, Nebraska, Kansas, Minnesota, Iowa, Illinois, Missouri, Indiana, Ohio, Michigan and Wisconsin. California (EXCLUDING THE BAY AREA), Washington, Oregon, Idaho, Montana, Wyoming, Nevada, Utah, Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas.*
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Enterprise team partners with National and Mid-Market businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium native search advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part in clients’ local advertising mix and the Enterprise team is growing fast!
The Enterprise Client Partner works with Yelp’s existing clients to grow their spend on Yelp. You will have a defined book of business and will be tasked with driving new revenue with those accounts. You will understand your clients’ business goals, marketing strategies, timelines and budgets to ensure Yelp is a prominent part of their marketing mix. To succeed in this role, you will secure investment in Yelp to drive sales at the local level for your clients. This is a high-energy, client-facing sales role requiring industry expertise and proven sales prowess. The Enterprise Client Partner role is key to Yelp’s success and significant growth is expected from our existing National Account base as we scale the Enterprise team!
#LI-REMOTE

item.title: Engineering Manager (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your remote engineering career to the next level? Yelp Engineering is filled with creative minds, collaborative teams & expert coders. We are looking for remote leaders to continue growing our talented teams. Average team size is small and you will work in lock step with the product team to get features out the door quickly.
Successful Managers are passionate about Yelp, keep up with our daily release cycles, and maintain our useful, funny, cool culture during times of immense growth. It also doesn't hurt to have strong technical skills.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Semantic Business Info (Remote)
item.description:
Ever wish you had information about a business right at your fingertips? Something about its health & safety, opening hours, services, or just a unique insight about that business? Interested in exploring that data, finding inventive ways to collect, curate, and make it easily accessible for others to use, and at scale? If taking millions of these data points and helping hundreds of millions of consumers connect with millions of businesses sounds exciting, come join us!
The Semantic Business Information (SBI) team at Yelp is looking for a leader to help manage this dynamic team. We’re a group focused on building the platform that contains information on the millions of businesses Yelp serves. We’re building new taxonomies to connect all this information, and new ways to ingest it via our APIs and scraping. We ensure that every team at Yelp has access to the highest quality information available, and are the backbone for the most important content that Yelp provides consumers.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

Interested in exploring that data, finding inventive ways to collect, curate, and make it easily accessible for others to use, and at scale? If taking millions of these data points and helping hundreds of millions of consumers connect with millions of businesses sounds exciting, come join us!
The Semantic Business Information (SBI) team at Yelp is looking for a leader to help manage this dynamic team. We’re a group focused on building the platform that contains information on the millions of businesses Yelp serves. We’re building new taxonomies to connect all this information, and new ways to ingest it via our APIs and scraping. We ensure that every team at Yelp has access to the highest quality information available, and are the backbone for the most important content that Yelp provides consumers.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Infrastructure - Flink, Beam, Kafka, Kubernetes (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp connects millions of people with great local businesses every day, and local businesses know it. More than 191,000 businesses subscribe to Yelp’s advertising products, and those happy customers account for nearly all of our revenue. However, local business advertising is still a rapidly growing market, and there are millions of business owners who’ve claimed their Yelp profile and aren’t customers yet. That’s where you come in.
We’re looking for a savvy and tenacious engineering manager to join our Data Infrastructure organization. The Data Infra ecosystem powers critical machine learning, real-time notifications, sales and marketing engineering, and experimentation and data warehousing use cases across Yelp. You’ll partner with engineering managers, program managers, product managers, and data science leaders to help deliver Yelp’s next generation data infrastructure ecosystem. Our group is located across the UK, Germany and North America, and looks after Yelp’s entire streaming infrastructure (Apache Kafka and Apache Flink) as well as databases (MySQL and Cassandra) and data warehouse (Redshift). You can read more about our infrastructure in the engineering blog.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Developer Insights & Automation (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your engineering leadership career to the next level? Our Engineering Effectiveness group designs, builds, and operates large-scale systems that enable Yelp developers to deliver world class features. We love to accelerate engineering workflows and deliver great developer experiences as we scale complex, highly reliable systems.
As the Engineering Manager of Yelp’s Developer Insights & Automation team, you will lead, coach, and grow a team of talented full stack engineers in building developer productivity tools to enrich and streamline the developer experience. This team will build automation tools to enable other teams to perform and track complex migrations across backend and frontend services. The team will also establish developer metrics and build dashboards to help service authors understand and improve the efficiency of their workflows across backend, web and mobile developer platforms.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Core Services (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your Engineering leadership career to the next level? Our Engineering Effectiveness group designs, builds, and operates large-scale systems that enable Yelp developers to deliver world class features. We love to accelerate engineering workflows and deliver great developer experiences as we scale complex, highly reliable systems.
As the Engineering Manager of Yelp’s Core Services team, you will lead, coach, and grow a team of talented engineers in building infrastructure to enrich and streamline the Python developer experience. This team will build developer productivity tools, libraries and establish best practices to help service authors write high quality, performant, maintainable code in Python. These frameworks will enable the majority of backend engineers who work on customer-facing products at Yelp deliver features quickly and reliably.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Core Java (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your engineering leadership career to the next level? Our Engineering Effectiveness group designs, builds, and operates large-scale systems that enable Yelp developers to deliver world-class features. We love to accelerate engineering workflows and deliver great developer experiences as we scale complex, highly reliable systems.
As the Engineering Manager of Yelp’s JVM team, you will lead, coach, and grow a talented team of engineers in building infrastructure to enrich and streamline the Java developer experience. Your team will build developer productivity tools and libraries, as well as help establish best practices to service authors to write high quality, performant, and maintainable code in Java, Scala, and Kotlin. These frameworks will enable developers working on many of our critical systems that power Search, Ads, ML, Data Infra, and Android products.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Core Java (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your engineering leadership career to the next level? Our Engineering Effectiveness group designs, builds, and operates large-scale systems that enable Yelp developers to deliver world-class features. We love to accelerate engineering workflows and deliver great developer experiences as we scale complex, highly reliable systems.
As the Engineering Manager of Yelp’s JVM team, you will lead, coach, and grow a talented team of engineers in building infrastructure to enrich and streamline the Java developer experience. Your team will build developer productivity tools and libraries, as well as help establish best practices to service authors to write high quality, performant, and maintainable code in Java, Scala, and Kotlin. These frameworks will enable developers working on many of our critical systems that power Search, Ads, ML, Data Infra, and Android products.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Biz Traffic (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp connects millions of people with great local businesses every day, and local businesses know it. More than 5.8 million business locations are actively claimed on Yelp. However, there are millions more out there that could be helped by Yelp’s products and services. That’s where you come in.
We’re looking for a savvy and tenacious engineering manager to join our Biz Traffic team. Our team's mission is to bring every eligible local business to Yelp. You will partner with engineering managers, program managers, product managers, and data science professionals to bring Yelp to more business owners. We rapidly launch new experiments to build product growth loops, referral programs, partnerships, and outreach strategies.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Ads (Remote)
item.description:
Our Ads group is responsible for balancing the interests of Yelp users, business owners, and Yelp’s revenue across a dynamic market that is constantly evolving. Our teams work together to decide what, where, and when to show ads to the millions of Yelp users that use the app or visit the site. We are driven to deliver the best value possible to small and large businesses across the country and help users meet their everyday needs. Our team of machine learning engineers, applied scientists, and backend engineers are responsible for the auction, pricing, delivery, and modeling systems needed to ensure the success of Yelp’s ads business.
As a manager within our Ads Marketplace group, you will lead, grow, and inspire a team of skilled engineers to meet the challenges of Yelp’s ever-changing ads landscape. You’ll collaborate closely with a cross-functional group of product managers, business analysts, data scientists, and the executive team to strategically balance shorter-term wins and longer-term investments.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Engineering Director, Data & Analytics Platform (Remote)
item.description:
Ready to take your leadership career to the next level? We’re looking for an Engineering Director with a background in Data Engineering and/or Data Analytics to lead our core data platform. The Data and Analytics Platform empowers Yelp to make quick and informed decisions about our product and business. As a leader in this space, you will scale large, complex, cross-platform experimentation systems and data pipelines. These pipelines power metrics which enable data scientists and product managers to make go/no-go decisions on every feature we ship them to the Yelp app — putting you and your teams at the very center of decision making at Yelp. In addition, these systems also guide teams like Financial Planning, Data Science, Marketing and Business Operations on business critical functions such as building our publicly reported metrics and discovering new markets.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular state within the US. We welcome applicants from throughout the US.

item.title: Director, Consumer Communications and PR
item.description:
*Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.*
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. As a trusted source of information on local business, millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make decisions about where to spend their money — from where to eat, shop or stay, to which healthcare, home or local service provider to use, and beyond.
We are looking for an experienced consumer communications leader to drive the strategy and direction of consumer PR at Yelp. You will lead our consumer PR team in building and executing a communications program focused on bringing people to Yelp, both through creative top-of-funnel campaigns that drive brand awareness and consideration, as well as down-funnel activations and initiatives to drive engagement with the Yelp app.
The ideal candidate is a strategic, creative and collaborative communications pro, who can expertly lead integrated consumer campaigns with internal and external partners. You will be responsible for big-picture thinking and high-level execution, managing agency partners and direct reports, maintaining a steady drumbeat of national and local PR initiatives, and finding creative ways to turn press coverage into app sessions.
This is a full time role located in the United States.

item.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, it’s our mission to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s unique dataset contains billions of interactions between users and businesses around the globe, from a review of a coffee shop to requesting a repair quote with a photo of a leaky faucet. Data Scientists at Yelp work to make sense of these interactions to deliver impactful analyses and products to our users, business partners and the general public.
The Data Science & Analytics team performs analyses, builds models, and designs experiments that directly impact Yelp’s products and users. Our teams sit in Yelp’s central product management organization and work directly with cross-functional leaders to understand quantitatively how our products are performing and where the largest opportunities are. We are adept at tasks like modeling user preferences, inference from user and marketplace experiments, and generating insights about the health of local economies. With diverse backgrounds and expertise, we strive for learning and growth in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
item.description:

item.title: Data Science Analyst (Remote)
item.description:
At Yelp, it’s our mission to connect people with great local businesses. From a coffee connoisseur’s review of a neighborhood cafe, to a homeowner’s request for a quote to remodel their kitchen, Yelp’s data captures millions of user-business interactions every day.
The Data Science & Analytics team prides itself on harnessing the power of this data. We test and learn, build tools and lead meaningful analyses to extract insights that influence Yelp’s product and business strategy.
We’re looking for a self-motivated critical thinker whose intellectual curiosity is met with a healthy dose of skepticism. You value the integrity of your work, sanity check analyses before drawing conclusions, and take pride in telling stories with data. You are a team player who is an excellent communicator, quick learner, and as excited about Yelp as we are.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.
Vaccination against COVID-19 is not required for this role. We nonetheless encourage all employees to get vaccinated. Employees who are not vaccinated may not visit Yelp’s offices or participate in any in-person work activities, and are not eligible to transfer or be promoted to a role that requires vaccination.

item.title: CRM Manager, Consumer Lifecycle Marketing
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Our team is growing at a rapid pace and we are looking for a CRM Manager, called internally a Lifecycle Manager, to join our Consumer Marketing team. This team member will be responsible for the channel execution of marketing programs, including email and push notifications, to drive consumer engagement on Yelp. And the best part is, you get to see the direct impact your campaigns have on our bottom line.
The ideal candidate brings a data-driven approach to decision-making, a keen creative eye, and has experience in email and push marketing. A successful candidate has experience supporting world-class marketing programs and is comfortable leveraging marketing automation technologies. They are relentlessly process driven, a stellar communicator, and detail-oriented.
This is a full time remote role located in the United States.

item.title: Copywriter
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Do you dream in headlines? Have nightmares about exclamation points? Admire bold and impactful creative work in the world and think, "Damn, I wish I thought of that?" If you just yelled, "yes!" out loud to no one in particular, we want to talk to you (and hopefully hire you).
We're building a world-class team at Yelp, and we're searching for a Copywriter to help us craft great copy and shape un-boring creative approaches, all while bringing joy, and inspiring others around you. No pressure.
We’re a team of writers, designers, animators, project managers, dog parents, and cheese lovers who make up Yelp’s internal creative agency. Our mission is to enable fandom—both inside and outside of Yelp. We do this by uncovering stories that introduce people to their next favorite local business, and living our values every day.
As a Copywriter, you'll play a key role in pushing Yelp's brand forward, working hand-in-hand with our partners—building strong relationships across the marketing organization and beyond.
This is a full time role located in the United States.

item.title: Community Manager - Tampa Bay, FL
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Do you love Tampa Bay? Are you the go-to person when it comes to planning a night out, always ready with a recommendation for the city’s most seasoned finds and hidden hotspots? As the Tampa Bay Community Manager, you’ll be a full-time Yelp employee (working out of your home or anywhere with secure WiFi) at the helm of a vibrant, buzzing community of locals who drink, shop and play their way through the city via peer recommendations on Yelp.
Community Managers are driven, self-motivated, charismatic, and organized as they’re tasked with wrangling a slew of to-do’s both on- and offline, from writing and moderating to party planning and ring leading!

item.title: Community Manager - Rhode Island
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Do you love Providence? Are you the go-to person when it comes to planning a night out, always ready with a recommendation for the city’s most seasoned finds and hidden hotspots? As the Rhode Island Community Manager, you’ll be a full-time Yelp employee (working out of your home or anywhere with secure WiFi) at the helm of a vibrant, buzzing community of locals who drink, shop and play their way through the city via peer recommendations on Yelp.
Community Managers are driven, self-motivated, charismatic, and organized as they’re tasked with wrangling a slew of to-do’s both on- and offline, from writing and moderating to party planning and ring leading!

item.title: Community Intern - Nashville, TN
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp is seeking interns to work side-by-side with our passionate, hard-working Community Managers. Wait, what’s Yelp? Yelp is a website and mobile app that connects people to great local businesses. From restaurants, boutiques and salons to dentists, mechanics, plumbers and more, we believe in helping consumers make smarter and more informed decisions about where to spend their money. And who is this Community Manager I’ll be working with? Community Managers in nearly 50 Yelp communities are responsible for marketing, PR, event planning, e-newsletter campaigns, social media, and various odds and ends on the local level — but they can’t do it alone! Yelp Interns play an integral part in supporting activities designed to rally the Yelp community both online and off.

item.title: Business Systems Analyst, Sales Systems (Remote)
item.description:
Love working with Salesforce? Do you like using your technical knowledge to help catalyze business success? Business Systems Analysts are the drivers for all Sales and Customer Success technical projects for thousands of users across Yelp. They follow projects from conception through execution, forming the bridge between our business teams and technical teams. On an average day, a BSA might be immersed in technical solution design meetings, talking to sales leadership about their strategic goals, documenting user stories, developing technical roadmaps, and always improving the Yelper experience.
As a BSA at Yelp, you'll have the opportunity to think creatively about how to make internal tools better, scale to support Yelp’s fast growth, and contribute to the success of the Sales & CS teams. You'll work with incredible teams of engineers, salesforce admins, product managers, and business partners. Join a fun team where you will continue to develop your skills while helping ensure that Yelp has an effective and scalable platform for our business-critical departments.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Business Systems Analyst, Financial Applications (Remote)
item.description:
Do you love taking on new financial applications projects? Do you have what it takes to drive change and deliver excellence?
Yelp is looking for a Business Systems Analyst to join our Financial Systems team. In this role, you’ll support the finance system environment at Yelp, and help lead projects related to expanding Yelp’s finance system footprint. Our team is a key member of the engineering organization, responsible for the management of the company’s financial, billing, and planning applications. We work with the finance organization to define and execute the vision and strategy. It’s on us to support major firm-wide initiatives while providing guidance and creative, innovative solutions.
The Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values authenticity and encourages “unboring” solutions to problems, while also having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Business Partner Leader (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for a Global Business Partner Leader to join our People Operations team. The Tech & Product Business Partner Team is focused on delivering on the talent strategies in support of Yelp’s Global Engineering and Product teams as they move to a globally distributed environment with expansion into new markets. Additionally, this role will provide matrixed leadership support to the EU Center of Excellence (COE) People Teams.
In this role, you will collaborate with, and act as a thought partner to, the executives of the Engineering and Product teams to develop and execute talent strategies that foster growth, innovation, and organization effectiveness. The role is both a strategic and hands-on role including improving organizational effectiveness & design, leading change management, providing leadership coaching, and driving overall People functional excellence.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.

item.title: Business Partner Leader (Remote)

item.title: Brand Sales Director (Remote)
item.description:
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
Yelp’s mission is to connect people with great local businesses. Yelp’s Enterprise team partners with National businesses to provide industry leading digital advertising solutions. Yelp’s premium native search advertising products deliver strong ROI by helping clients connect with potential customers at the bottom of the purchase funnel. Yelp has become an essential part in client’s Local advertising mix and the Enterprise team is growing fast.
We are looking for an entrepreneurial, sales driven leader to generate revenue with our search re-targeting product, primarily through Agencies. You will develop and work a territory and drive new business from prospecting to close. As Yelp’s Brand Sales Director, you will drive revenue and growth of Yelp’s search re-targeting products through our audience platform.
To succeed in this role, you will need to have relevant digital or advertising sales experience and a demonstrated track record of exceeding goals. The Brand Sales Director role is key to Yelp’s success and offers significant career growth opportunities within Yelp’s Enterprise Sales team!

item.title: Backend Engineer - Compliance Engineering (Remote)
item.description:
Yelp is looking for an authentic, tenacious, unboring Backend engineer—who plays well with others and protects the source!—to join our Compliance Engineering team. You’ll take on a diverse set of challenges across Yelp engineering, working closely with the rest of the organization to ensure compliance across all of Yelp’s applications.
As a Backend engineer on the Compliance Engineering team, you’ll have a tremendous impact protecting Yelp’s enormous data footprint, our employees, and our millions of users. You’ll have the opportunity to partner with stakeholders to develop, monitor, and maintain solutions that meet all applicable data regulations and privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.) at Yelp, as well as build tools to automate manual validation.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Applied Scientist (Remote)
item.description:
Are you intrigued by data? Yelp has hundreds of millions of pieces of user-contributed content, millions of users and business listings, and hundreds of thousands of advertising customers – and all of these numbers are constantly growing. Making sense of this data, deducing relationships between variables, and figuring out different interactions is hard work, but these insights are hugely impactful to Yelp’s business. Applied scientists uncover these insights through exploratory research and analysis, and carry the ideas all the way through to production-grade statistical or predictive models. They work in areas including pricing models and auction bidding strategies, learning to rank applications, personalized recommender systems, trust and safety / spam detection, and causal inference.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that encourages individual authenticity and “unboring” solutions to problems. We enable all new team members to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we’re all about helping our users, growing as engineers and scientists, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Applied Scientist - Trust and Safety (Remote)
item.description:
Are you intrigued by data? Yelp has hundreds of millions of pieces of user-contributed content, millions of users, and millions of business listings – and all of these numbers are constantly growing. Making sense of this data, deducing relationships between variables and figuring out different interactions is challenging work, and these insights are hugely impactful to Yelp’s core business.
Yelp is trusted by our users, every day, to help make decisions about where to eat, which mover to call, or best places to visit in a new city. Our team’s mission is to surface high-quality content that reflects authentic experiences generated by real Yelpers who are engaged with the community. Join a team of experts on opinion and content spam and get the chance to contribute to the growth of one of the leading companies in this problem space.
As an Applied Scientist on Trust & Safety you will employ your analytical skills to detect and understand content spam at Yelp. You will set up robust statistical experiments to characterize user behaviour, assess our models through careful statistical analysis, and build end-to-end machine learned models that impact hundreds of millions of consumer contributions.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that encourages individual authenticity and creative solutions to problems. We enable all new team members to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we’re all about helping our users, growing as engineers and scientists, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don’t feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.
This opportunity is fully remote and does not require you to be located in any particular area in Canada. We welcome applicants from throughout Canada.

item.title: Applied Scientist - Ad Targeting (Remote)
item.description:
Do you want to help local businesses grow? Our Ad Targeting team connects millions of users to the right businesses each day. From restaurants, boutiques, and salons, to dentists, mechanics, and plumbers, our recommendation system knows just the place.
As an Applied Scientist, you will design robust A/B experiments to characterize user behavior, assess machine learning models through careful statistical analysis, and build end-to-end machine learning models that help millions of users make better decisions.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that values individual authenticity and encourages creative solutions to problems. We enable all new team members to deploy working code in their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. Learn more about Yelp by visiting: Culture at Yelp / Yelp Fact Sheet / Diversity at Yelp / Yelp Engineering Blog / Yelp Blog / Yelp Open Source / Yelp Economic Average.

Making sense of this data, deducing relationships between variables, and figuring out different interactions is hard work, but these insights are hugely impactful to Yelp’s business. Applied scientists uncover these insights through exploratory research and analysis, and carry the ideas all the way through to production-grade statistical or predictive models. They work in areas including pricing models and auction bidding strategies, learning to rank applications, personalized recommender systems, trust and safety / spam detection, and causal inference.
Yelp engineering culture is driven by our values: we’re a cooperative team that encourages individual authenticity and “unboring” solutions to problems. We enable all new team members to deploy working code their first week, and your impact will only grow from there with the support of your manager, mentor, and team. At the end of the day, we’re all about helping our users, growing as engineers and scientists, and having fun in a collaborative environment.
This opportunity requires you to be located in the United Kingdom.
We’d love to have you apply, even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Yelp, we’re looking for great people, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.

item.title: Analyst, Corporate Strategy
item.description:
At Yelp, it’s our mission to connect people with great local businesses. The Yelp Strategy team supports this mission by working with leaders to help Yelp stay one step ahead of trends and competition. The Strategy work is leveraged by executives to chart an efficient and decisive course over a 3 year time horizon.
The Strategy team works to identify the growth opportunities and threats in our business. The team synthesizes internal analyses and external data, pulling it all together into a strategic direction that is refreshed over time. Strategy helps ensure that teams across the company align investments with Yelp’s strategic direction.
As an Analyst or Senior Analyst on the Strategy team, you’ll develop analyses and synthesize competitive landscape data to drive actionable industry insights for our executives. As you master landscape assessment, you’ll then also work on internal strategy projects, helping operating leaders synthesize customer & competitive insight into an agreed direction, objectives, and potential growth levers. You’ll be reporting to a Strategy Team Lead and work closely with the SVP of Strategy.
We’re looking for someone with a knack for synthesis - the ability to find and integrate a broad range of qualitative and quantitative sources into pithy, impactful insights. You are a highly driven and proactive person with a record of high impact and achievement, eager to apply your analytical and creative talents to new challenges. You are a team player who is an excellent communicator, quick learner, and as excited about Yelp as we are.
Candidates must be vaccinated against COVID-19 to qualify for this role. See below for more information.
This is a full-time remote role based in the United States.
